```{r, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

# **************************************************************************** #
# ***************                baby_toxicum                                            
# **************************************************************************** #
# rows:            28530
# cols:            5 
# unique baby id:  28530
# repeat:          1
# ICD9/10:         NA

# variables
# baby_id, vaccine_date, vaccine_name


# EXTRACT DATA FROM EXCEL

# import variables
n_max=1000000
data_file_name="baby_toxicum.csv"
data_dir=paste0("~/ehr-database/data/raw/dataset_09_2021/")
data_import_path=paste0(data_dir,data_file_name)

# read data
toxicum=read_csv(data_import_path) 

# rename
# note: renaming to eliminate spaces EVEN THOUGH we will rename or drop later.
newdata=rename(toxicum, 
               baby_id = `Deidentified_baby_ID`, 
               diagnosis_start = `Diagnosis Start Date`,
               diagnosis_code = `Diagnosis Code`,
               diagnosis_descrip = `Diagnosis Description`,
               diagnosis_type = `Diagnosis Type`)


# FORMAT FOR REDCAP

toxicum_ready=newdata %>%
  mutate(redcap_repeat_instrument="Toxicum",
         redcap_event_name=paste0(year(diagnosis_start),"_arm_1")) %>%
         mutate(diagnosis_descrip=gsub(" ","_",diagnosis_descrip)) %>%
  mutate(diagnosis_type=gsub(" ","_",diagnosis_type),
         part_id=paste0("baby-",baby_id),
         baby_id=paste0("baby-",baby_id)) %>%
  group_by(baby_id, redcap_event_name,diagnosis_start) %>% mutate(redcap_repeat_instance = row_number()) %>%
  select("baby_id", "redcap_repeat_instrument","redcap_repeat_instance","redcap_event_name", everything()) 
  

## EXPORT FOR REDCAP

# export variables
batchSize=10000; # number of rows in single output file
data_file_name_export=paste0("baby_",as.character(toxicum_ready[2,2]))
output_dir=paste0("~/ehr-database/data/processed/redcap_ready/baby_toxicum/")
data_export_path=paste0(output_dir,data_file_name_export)

# Note: expecting to expot to PATH: ~/ehr-database/data/processed/redcap_ready/delivery/
# NA: missing values are coded as "empty" in output

# number of import files
 chunks=split(toxicum_ready, floor(0:(nrow(toxicum_ready)-1)/batchSize))

# export each "chunk" of redcap-ready data
 for (i in 1:length(chunks))
   { # second loop
   write.table(chunks[[i]],paste0(data_export_path,i,'.csv'),row.names=F,na = "", sep=",")
   } # end second loop        



```
